tool_description: Routes tickets to appropriate agents based on skills, workload, availability, and specialization requirements.

required_skills.description: Specific skills needed for this ticket

exclude_agents.description: Agent IDs to exclude from assignment

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
No available agents: All qualified agents are currently unavailable or at capacity.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [P1, P2, P3, P4].
Skill matching failed: No agents found with required skills for this ticket.
Assignment conflict: Cannot exclude all qualified agents from assignment.
usage: Provide ticket information and requirements to automatically assign the most suitable available agent based on skills, workload, and priority.

estimated_response_time.description: Expected time for agent to respond

match_score.description: How well the agent matches ticket requirements (0-1)
